Text:
thank you so much !!!
i have the lg 42lx6500 and i've been dealing with the same shitty situation now and then ... audio doesnt work or resolution aint right ...
im gonna try ur work and see if the quality doesnt go down to much ... if not ... then ur my new hero !! maybe its to early for a request :$ but is there any chance u can upload ( sharks 3d ) anyway ... ur the MAN !!!

works really great !! no problems with audio or resolution :D but dont you think u could just keep the size the way they are ... u do see a bit of quality loss ... not that its horrible quality all of a sudden ... but i wouldnt mind downloading ur files that work great when they're 8 to 13 gig ... dont we downloaders all have a hard drive ;) 

anyways thank you so much !!! you're really helping me out with this ... and i bet lots of others ...

what is the program called u use 2 convert the audio ??

I can recommend Xilisoft Video Convert Ultimate 6 for converting any files. The only SBS files I have had to use something else for were a few that had TrueHD audio which I had to use Clown BD (eac3to) to convert. If you have a problem getting a working reg/crack for Xilisoft Video Convert Ultimate 6 download and use a portable version which is what I had to do cause I found the reg/crack for normal install did not work after upgrading.
ive downloaded 3 from u now and none have worked on my samsung thru the usb, just says codec not supported
can't this be seen in a red blue 3d??

@toon1906 Are you plugging the usb directly into the tv, or do you have one of the samsung blu ray players? Although I haven't tried this film yet, others uploaded by r3dcat (thanks a lot!) work perfectly through a usb connected to my blu ray player.

Hi,

I just bought an LG 55LW650S and downloaded some 3d movies to try them out. I play them from my Popcorn Hour A-110 which is connected via HDMI cable.
I also found out that some movies just don't play.
I also downloaded this one, the video plays fine, but the sound is distorted, even though it is AC3.
I have the same problem with some other 3d movies of which the sound is distorted but the picture looks OK.

Thanks! For everyone who has a 3D tv and gets the error you have to convert the video on your computer. I recommend using anyvideo converter. Convert the .mkv file to .mp4 that way you can even burn the .mp4 file on to a dvd and play it on your tv just make sure to put your tv into side by side mode.
thank you so much for the movie can u please upload the green hornet 3d and jackass 3d (any but both if possible)
howcome this is only 22 minutes long? am I doing something wrong?
Wow, thank you for making such high quality downloads available. These are perfect for my LG LED TV. Thank you :-)

I am Requesting
Please! Upload Thor 3D in SBS

TO ALL LG 3D TV USERS!
DTS is NOT compatible if you plug your usb hdd directly on the TV, don't panic, just use this tool http://www.videohelp.com/tools/MKV2AC3 and it will remove the DTS from the movie!
I takes around 20 min to get the work done, but it does an amazing one! Good luck LG 3DTV users!
